Headline: #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson Temporary Westbound Reroute near Congress/Central Park
ShortDescription: WB 7 Harrison, 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner & Harrison: due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison, #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Congress, Central Park, Jackson, Kostner and Harrison: due to, street blockage near Congress/Central Park.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing due to track switching problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing due to track switching problems.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as #97 Skokie, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
